footer.title: Roots Company
footer.description: Roots Company is a leading provider of high-quality products and services. We are committed to delivering excellence and customer satisfaction.

heroSection.description: Experience superior frozen fruits, vegetables, and potato products crafted with cutting-edge freezing technology and rigorous quality standards.

ColdChainSection.title:
Preserving Freshness
at -18°C
ColdChainSection.description: Our advanced cold chain management ensures that every product retains its natural nutritional value and taste from the moment of harvest to the final delivery. We utilize rapid IQF (Individually Quick Frozen) methods to lock in vitamins and minerals at their peak.
ColdChainSection.imageAlt: Modern industrial freezing facility with stainless steel equipment

productCategories.sectionDescription: Discover our diverse range of premium frozen products, processed with care to maintain the highest quality standards.

fruits.title: Frozen Fruits
fruits.description: Premium berries, mangoes, and tropical blends harvested at peak ripeness.

vegetables.title: Frozen Vegetables
vegetables.description: Farm-fresh mixed greens, peas, and corn, processed instantly to preserve nutrients.

fries.title: Frozen French Fries
fries.description: Golden, crispy premium-cut potato products in various specialized styles.

freezing.title: Modern Freezing Systems
freezing.description: Utilizing state-of-the-art IQF tunnels that prevent cell structure damage during freezing.

hygiene.title: Strict Hygiene Protocols
hygiene.description: Automated cleaning systems and rigorous sanitation standards exceeding international safety norms.

storage.title: Temperature-Controlled Storage
storage.description: Massive automated storage facility with redundant cooling systems for absolute safety.

ctaSection.description: Join our network of global partners and experience excellence in frozen food production.

Hero.description: High-quality IQF products capturing nature's peak freshness and nutrients for global supply chains. From individual quick freezing to specialized commercial packaging.

frozenFruits.title: Premium Frozen Fruits
frozenFruits.description: Discover our wide range of premium frozen fruits, carefully selected and processed using advanced IQF technology to preserve natural taste, color, and nutritional value. From berries to tropical fruits, we offer the finest quality for your business needs.

vegetables.title: Fresh Frozen Vegetables
vegetables.description: Our farm-fresh vegetables are harvested at peak ripeness and quickly frozen to lock in nutrients and flavor. We offer a comprehensive selection of mixed vegetables, peas, corn, and specialty items for foodservice and retail markets.

frenchFries.title: Golden French Fries
frenchFries.description: Experience the perfect crunch with our premium frozen french fries. Made from carefully selected potatoes and available in various cuts and styles, our fries deliver consistent quality and excellent taste for restaurants and food service operations.

solutions.title: Custom B2B Solutions
solutions.description: We provide tailored frozen food solutions for businesses worldwide. From custom packaging to specialized product development, our team works with you to meet your unique requirements and help grow your business.

TabFrozenFruits.title: Individually Quick Frozen (IQF) Fruits
TabFrozenFruits.description: Our proprietary IQF technology preserves the cellular structure of every berry and slice. We capture fruits at the peak of ripeness, ensuring your production line receives consistent texture and vibrant natural color.

texture.title: IQF Texture
texture.description: Advanced freezing prevents clumping and maintains structural integrity.

nutrient.title: Nutrient Retention
nutrient.description: Process locks in vitamins and minerals immediately after harvest.

taste.title: Natural Taste
taste.description: No added preservatives; just pure, mountain-fresh harvest flavor.

TabFrozenVegetables.title: Frozen Vegetables
TabFrozenVegetables.description: Grown with care and processed using advanced technology to ensure peak freshness for commercial kitchens and industrial food production.

harvest.title: Peak Harvest Timing
harvest.description: Our vegetables are harvested and frozen within 4 hours to stop the natural aging process and lock in sugar-to-starch ratios.

sorting.title: Advanced Sorting
sorting.description: Optical sorting technology ensures uniform size and color, removing any defects before the freezing tunnel.

cleanLabel.title: Clean Label Focus
cleanLabel.description: 100% natural. No additives, bleaching agents, or preservatives. Meets the highest global food safety standards.

TabFrozenFries.title: Frozen French Fries & Potato Products
TabFrozenFries.description: Engineered for performance in commercial fryers. Our fries offer the perfect balance of a crisp exterior and fluffy interior, with consistent length and minimal breakage.

consistency.title: Golden Consistency
consistency.description: Carefully monitored solid content ensures uniform frying and golden color every time.

cut.title: Precision Cut
cut.description: From shoe-string to steak-cut, our high-precision water-jet cutters ensure smooth surfaces.

recovery.title: Optimized Recovery
recovery.description: Minimal oil absorption design leads to better yields and healthier profiles for your customers.

customSolutions.title: Custom Tailored Solutions
customSolutions.description: We don't just supply products; we partner with you to solve logistics and packaging challenges. Our facility is designed for extreme adaptability.

packaging.title: Packaging Adaptability
packaging.description: From 400g retail bags to 1000kg industrial totes, we offer flexible filling lines. Private labeling (OEM) services available with full design support.

logistics.title: Global Logistics Support
logistics.description: Seamless export documentation and cold-chain management to any major port worldwide. We maintain -18°C integrity throughout the entire journey.

aboutHero.title: Nourishing the World from the Ground Up
aboutHero.description: A global leader in high-quality industrial food solutions and export-ready logistics, rooted in excellence since inception.

whoWeAre.title: Bridging the Gap Between Sustainable Farming and Global Markets
whoWeAre.description: Roots Foods Co. operates at the intersection of traditional agriculture and modern industrial technology. We specialize in the large-scale processing and distribution of premium food products, ensuring that the highest standards of quality are maintained from the soil to the shipping container.

corePrinciples.sectionDescription: Our foundation is built on transparency, reliability, and an unwavering commitment to feeding a growing population sustainably.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide sustainable, high-quality food solutions globally by empowering farmers through technology and ensuring food security through efficient, carbon-neutral supply chains.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the preferred global partner in the food supply chain, setting the gold standard for food traceability and leading the industry in ethical export practices by 2030.

step1.title: Strategic Logistics Network
step1.description: Our state-of-the-art facilities are strategically located near major transit hubs. This ensures "export-ready" status for all products, minimizing transit times and maximizing freshness for international markets.

step2.title: Rigorous Quality Control
step2.description: Quality is not just a promise; it's a protocol. Every batch undergoes exhaustive testing in our certified labs to meet and exceed the most stringent global food safety standards, including ISO and Global GAP.

partnerCTA.title: Ready to Partner with Roots?
partnerCTA.description: Contact our global export team today to discuss high-volume industrial food solutions tailored to your market needs.

facilitiesHero.title: World-Class Industrial Infrastructure
facilitiesHero.description: Powering the future of food production with precision-engineered freezing, storage, and distribution systems across 1.2M+ square feet.

precisionFreezing.sectionDescription: We utilize state-of-the-art IQF technology and high-velocity blast freezers to preserve cellular integrity and nutrient density.

iqf.title: IQF Technology
iqf.description: Individually Quick Frozen systems ensure each piece of produce is frozen separately, preventing clumping and maintaining texture.

blast.title: High-Velocity Blast
blast.description: Industrial-grade air circulation units capable of reducing core temperatures to -40°F in record time for maximum safety.

monitoring.title: Smart Monitoring
monitoring.description: Real-time IoT sensors monitor temperature, humidity, and airflow 24/7 across every cubic inch of our storage facilities.

fleet.title: Dedicated Fleet
fleet.description: Temperature-controlled trucking fleet equipped with telematics and GPS tracking for precise delivery windows.

locations.title: Strategic Locations
locations.description: Facilities positioned within 4 hours of major international ports and transcontinental rail hubs.

sorting.title: Automated Sorting
sorting.description: Advanced WMS integration allows for seamless cross-docking and inventory management.

industrialPurity.title: Industrial Purity
industrialPurity.description: Our facilities exceed GFSI and SQF standards for food safety.

facilitiesCTA.title: Ready to Scale Your Production?
facilitiesCTA.description: Inquire about our facility availability, private labeling, and custom cold chain solutions.

ProductionHero.description: We deploy industry-leading IQF technology and real-time monitored cold-chain infrastructure to ensure nature's integrity is preserved at the molecular level.

iqfTechnology.title: Advanced Individual Quick Freezing (IQF)
iqfTechnology.description: Our proprietary IQF tunnels utilize fluidized bed technology, ensuring each berry, pea, or floret is frozen independently. This rapid process prevents the formation of large ice crystals, preserving the delicate cellular wall structure of organic produce.

brix.title: Brix Preservation
brix.description: Natural sugar levels locked at peak harvest.

intake.title: Post-Harvest Intake
intake.description: Incoming produce is sanitized and sorted within 4 hours of farm extraction using optical grading technology.

iqf.title: IQF Immersion
iqf.description: Individual items pass through a high-velocity cryogenic air stream, halting cellular degradation instantly.

storage.title: Controlled Storage
storage.description: Sealed items are moved to our -18°C automated storage system with multi-point temperature telemetry.

logistics.title: Integrated Logistics
logistics.description: Direct dispatch to global markets via monitored reefer containers, maintaining the cold-chain end-to-end.

climateControl.title: Climate Control Security
climateControl.quote: We treat temperature as a variable that must never change.

alerts.title: Automated Alert Systems
alerts.description: Instant notifications for any fluctuation exceeding 0.5°C from the setpoint.

power.title: Triple-Redundant Power
power.description: Dedicated backup generators and solar arrays ensure 100% cooling uptime.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Our facility meets and exceeds international standards for food safety and environmental impact.

notFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off. Let's get you back on track.
notFound.helpText: Need help? Contact our support team anytime.
